songs.title: Ratatouille
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Drake]
Hold the USP I do 'em Louis like I'm Dolph
They say holy when they see the chain, it's not a cross
Put the owl on it, you can never take it off

[Verse 2: Quavo]
When they see the chain, yeah, they know it's Ratatouille
6am in South Africa, I make a movie
White McLaren let the wings up and show the Uzi
Drizzy got Baka off with a not guilty
